qas.question: What is the new name of the Sister City Program of the City of New York, Inc.?
In what year did the Sister City Program of the City of New York, Inc. have its name changed?

context: In <a1_0>2006<a1_0/>, the Sister City Program of the City of New York, Inc. was restructured and renamed <a0_0>New York City Global Partners<a0_0/>. New York City has expanded its international outreach via this program to a network of cities worldwide, promoting the exchange of ideas and innovation between their citizenry and policymakers, according to the city's website. New York's historic sister cities are denoted below by the year they joined New York City's partnership network.
